name: 逃出妙瓦底
description:
At the beginning of the game, you will play the role of a female college student with amnesia, searching for an exit deep in the cave.
1. Function:
The game controls the movement of the protagonist through the directional keys on the keyboard, and interacts with the scene through the space bar to obtain props. In the game, you will find various props that can be combined or used by opening your backpack. In addition, as the game plot unfolds, you will find that this cave is not an ordinary cave, and there are many goblins living inside. You need to use your skills and wisdom to evade Goblin's pursuit and finally find the exit to escape from the cave.
2. Content:
The game includes a total of 8 chapters, 20+levels, over 60 CGs, over 10 dynamic graphics, and hundreds of props. Each level in the game has a rating mechanism, and the system will rate you based on the number of deaths and escape time. If the rating is A or above, a hidden memory CG will also be activated.
3. Features:
Original plot, imaginative puzzles, passionate game between beautiful women and beasts, open your mind and embark on a thrilling escape from the secret room together
